en_text: When the MWPSB can't use the Dominators, they're no trouble at all.
jp_text: ドミネーターの使えねえ 公安なんてへでもねえ
google_translated: Even if it is easy to use the dominator

en_text: ...a serious screw loose.
jp_text: 肝心なところで一本ネジが抜けてるよな
google_translated: One screw is missing in the important place

en_text: You're carrying valuable treasure like that around all by yourself.
jp_text: それだけのお宝を１人で持ち歩いて 用心とか考えなかったわけ
google_translated: I did not think about it with one treasure alone

en_text: This was a tool to promote awareness...
jp_text: これは啓蒙のための道具だったんだ
google_translated: This was a tool for enlightenment

en_text: and to stop them from living idle lives like livestock.
jp_text: 家畜のような惰眠から目を覚ましてやるために…
google_translated: In order to wake up from a livestock sleeping sleep ...

en_text: to properly evaluate the danger in front of them.
jp_text: 目の前の危機を正しく評価できなくなった
google_translated: I could not evaluate the crisis in front of my eyes correctly

en_text: In that sense, you guys are as foolish as those pitiful sheep.
jp_text: その意味では君たちも あの哀れな羊たちと等しく愚かしい…
google_translated: In that sense, you are also foolish with that pitiable sheep ...

en_text: Ha! Is that right?!
jp_text: ヘッ　そうかよ！
google_translated: Hey!

en_text: Alas... It really is...
jp_text: ああ…本当に嘆かわしいことだ
google_translated: Oh ... It's really sad
